text: Ni na we waremye ibirere n'isi mu minsi itandatu, kandi intebe ye y’icyubahiro (Ar’shi) yari hejuru y’amazi; (ibyo byose yabikoze) kugira ngo abagerageze (bityo agaragaze) muri mwe urusha abandi ibikorwa byiza. Ariko uramutse ubabwiye uti "Mu by’ukuri, muzazurwa nyuma yo gupfa", babandi bahakanye bavuga bati "Iyi (Qur’an) nta kindi iri cyo uretse ko ari uburozi bugaragara
